name: Old Macdonald, Hell on Earth Edition
name_original: Old Macdonald, Hell on Earth Edition
description:
Fight! Demon cows, and other unholy abominations from the depths of the earth like chickens(Yes chickens come from hell).

Place holy variants of the same animals.

I think there's 5 slugcats.

Defend your farm from mass destruction as the last farmer on earth unravaged by these horrors.

No wait, I found a 6th slugcat...

Find us on twitter @redyegr @jarkeybacon @risingthumb219
